author: Steve Silva
title: Yukon to provide free cellphones to women in vulnerable situations amid COVID-19 pandemic
description: The Yukon government is going to provide 325 cellphones with four-month service plans for free to women in vulnerable situations starting Monday.
content:
The Yukon government is going to provide 325 cellphones with four-month service plans for free to women in vulnerable situations, starting Monday.
It's in response to changes to everyday life as the world deals with the spread of COVID-19, which could entail… [+1678 chars]
